content: this is a legal summary of a court case that took place in rome in 2010 the case involves a married couple seeking the division of their community property the court has ordered the dissolution of the property which includes two flats a cellar and two garage rooms an expert has determined the division of the property with one party receiving the flats and cellar and the other party receiving a flat and a garage room the movable property inside the flats will also be divided accordingly the parties will share the costs of physically dividing the garage one party has been ordered to pay a sum of money to the other party and both parties will be responsible for their own legal costs the court will also consider additional requests and objections made by the parties the decision was made in august 2010
